typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory,bytes memory) external returns (bytes4)

BuyOrder(uint256,address,bool,uint256,ui.details: this is event which is created when a user creates order to sell his tokens

params.buyer: this is the address of the owner or the Buy order
params.communityTokenAmount: this is the community token amount for Buy order
params.communityTokenId: this is the community token id that is involved in the Buy order
params.communityTokenPrice: this is the price of single token
params.crdBalance: this is the total balance remaining for the order
params.creationDate: this is the creation date of the Buy order
params.governanceTokenAmount: this is the community token amount for Buy order
params.governanceTokenId: this is the community token id that is involved in the Buy order
params.governanceTokenPrice: this is the price of single token
params.isLockedInRatio: the is denotes wether the user wants to sell the token individually or in a ratio
params.saleId: this is the Id of the Buy order

OrderClose(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: this event is emmited when user closes his/her sale order

params.creationDate: This is the date when the event took place
params.remainingBalance: This is the amount that was remaining from the partially fulfilled orders
params.saleId: This is the sale Id of the sale order

SaleBought(uint256,address,address,uint2.details: this is event which is created when a user purchases any sale order

params.amountTransferred: this is the total amount paid
params.buyer: this is the address of the owner or the sale order
params.communityTokenAmount: this is the community token amount for sale
params.communityTokenId: this is the community token id that is involved in the sale
params.communityTokenPrice: this is the price of single token
params.creationDate: this is the date when tokens were purchased
params.governanceTokenAmount: this is the community token amount for sale
params.governanceTokenId: this is the community token id that is involved in the sale
params.governanceTokenPrice: this is the price of single token
params.platformFees: this is the platform fees taken by crowdrecords
params.saleId: this is the Id of the sale order
params.seller: this is the address of the person who sold the tokens in exchange for the crd

acceptBuyOrder(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: This function is called to accept the existing buy order

cancelBuyOrder(uint256).details: This function is called to cancel the existing sale order

createBuyOrder(bool,uint256,uint256,uint.details: This function is called to create a new saleOrder

setTreasuryContractAddress(address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: Below code are for transfer of tokens from ERC1155 standard contract
